source_text: The License awarded by the Department of Energy, Environment and Climate Action pursuant to a competitive application process - covers an area of approximately 19 square kilometres that includes extensive historic mine workings from which approximately 118,000 ounces of gold at a grade of 19.1 g/t Au were reportedly produced¹.
additional_details: The coverage area is specifically for the Queen's Birthday project (EL7937). The area was originally stated as 19 square kilometres and converted to hectares (1 km² = 100 ha).
